Description: Blue/green glazed composition figure in the form of a cynocephalus; the base is lost.
Curator's comments: Published: Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (Japan 1999-2000): No 91
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1986 Jun-Oct, Carmarthen Museum, A son of Luxor's Sands 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed 2006-present, Glasgow, Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum, LT Loan Ancient Egypt British Museum Partnership Gallery
Acquisition name: Donated by: Lt-Gen Augustus W H Meyrick
